resources.string: Either the origin or the destination is missing
The origin and the destination must not be the same station
And where are you travelling to?
How many bus and/or tram journeys?
If your bus/tram journeys are all within the space of an hour, you should consider them as a single journey
App developed by Alan Camargo. Powered by TfL Open Data. Contains OS data © Crown copyright and database rights 2016. Contains Geomni UK Map data © and database rights [2019].

Since this is the first time you\'re using this app, perhaps it will be a good idea to have a quick look at the settings to make sure you\'re happy with the way your data is handled. You can always change it later if you want.
